LyricsResult.lyrics: There's a fire starting in my heart Reaching a fever pitch and it's bringin' me out the dark Finally I can see you crystal clear Go ahead and sell me out and I'll lay your shit bare See how I'll leave with every piece of you Don't underestimate the things that I will do There's a fire starting in my heart Reaching a fever pitch and it's bringin' me out the dark The scars of your love remi[...]
